tool.name: CellVoyager image to OME-Zarr Init
tool.description: Prepare OME-Zarr structure from Cellvoyager images

param.name: zarr_dir
param.label: Output Zarr path
param.help: Path of the directory where the new OME-Zarrs will be created.

param.name: allowed_channels
param.label: Allowed Channels in JSON format
param.help: A list of Omero Channel, where each channel must include the wavelength_id attribute and where the wavelength_id values must be unique across the list.

param.name: num_levels
param.label: Number of pyramid levels
param.help: Number of resolution-pyramid levels. If set to 5, there will be the full-resolution level and 4 levels of downsampled images.

param.name: coarsening_xy
param.help: Linear coarsening factor between subsequent levels. If set to `2`, level 1 is 2x downsampled, level 2 is 4x downsampled etc.

param.name: image_extension
param.label: Image extension
param.help: Filename extension of images (e.g. tif or png)

data.name: output_json
data.label: Parallelization list in JSON
data.help: A metadata dictionary containing important metadata about the OME-Zarr plate, the images and some parameters required by downstream tasks.

tool.help: **What it does** This tool initializes the structure for an OME-Zarr plate based on CellVoyager images. It does not write the image data but only creates metadata and folder layout.
